md:
giải nghĩa từ "supported" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Supported** (verb)

* Meaning: to give help or assistance to someone or something
* Vietnamese: hỗ trợ

Example sentence: The company supported the local charity by donating money.

**Supported** (adjective)

* Meaning: having the help or approval of someone or something
* Vietnamese: được hỗ trợ

Example sentence: The project was supported by the government, so it was able to continue.

**Supported** (past tense of support)

* Meaning: gave help or assistance to someone or something in the past
* Vietnamese: đã hỗ trợ

Example sentence: We supported the team by cheering them on during the game.

Related words:

* Support (verb)
* Supporter (noun)
* Supporting (verb)
* Supportive (adjective)
html:

Supported (verb)

Example sentence: The company supported the local charity by donating money.

Supported (adjective)

  • Vietnamese: được hỗ trợ

Example sentence: The project was supported by the government, so it was able to continue.

Supported (past tense of support)

  • Meaning: gave help or assistance to someone or something in the past
  • Vietnamese: đã hỗ trợ

Example sentence: We supported the team by cheering them on during the game.
